channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- Solid Edge SE2023
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- Solid Edge SE2023

item.title: CVE-2023-49121|2024-01-09T09:59:52.512Z -- siemens -- solid%20edge%20se2023
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0 Update 10). The affected application is vulnerable to heap-based buffer overflow while parsing specially crafted PAR files. This could allow an attacker to execute code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2023-49131|2024-01-09T10:00:05.693Z -- siemens -- solid%20edge%20se2023
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0 Update 10). The affected application is vulnerable to uninitialized pointer access while parsing specially crafted PAR files. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2023-49127|2024-01-09T09:59:58.842Z -- siemens -- solid%20edge%20se2023
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0 Update 10). The affected applications contain an out of bounds read past the end of an allocated structure while parsing specially crafted PAR files. This could allow an attacker to execute code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2023-49129|2024-01-09T10:00:02.399Z -- siemens -- solid%20edge%20se2023
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0 Update 10). The affected applications contain a stack overflow vulnerability while parsing specially crafted PAR files. This could allow an attacker to execute code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2023-39188|2023-08-08T09:20:57.321Z -- siemens -- solid%20edge%20se2023
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0 Update 7). The affected applications contain an out of bounds read past the end of an allocated structure while parsing specially crafted DFT files. This could allow an attacker to execute code in the context of the current process.

item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0 Update 7). This could allow an attacker to execute code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2023-39549|2023-08-08T09:21:01.403Z -- siemens -- solid%20edge%20se2023
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0 Update 2). The affected application contains a use-after-free vulnerability that could be triggered while parsing specially crafted DWG file. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current process. (ZDI-CAN-19562)

item.title: CVE-2023-30985|2023-08-08T09:20:22.154Z -- siemens -- solid%20edge%20se2023
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0 Update 3), Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0 Update 2). Affected applications contain an out of bounds read past the end of an allocated buffer while parsing a specially crafted OBJ file. This vulnerability could allow an attacker to disclose sensitive information. (ZDI-CAN-19426)

item.title: CVE-2023-30986|2023-08-08T09:20:23.259Z -- siemens -- solid%20edge%20se2023
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0 Update 3), Solid Edge SE2023 (All versions < V223.0 Update 2). Affected applications contain a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing specially crafted STP files. This could allow an attacker to execute code in the context of the current process. (ZDI-CAN-19561)
